tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WaterQualityData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  datetime TIMESTAMP,
  pH FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE AquacultureConditions ( 
  observation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  observation_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
  tank_id INT, 
  pH FLOAT, 
  temperature FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE WaterQualityData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  datetime TIMESTAMP,
  pH FLOAT,
  temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE AquacultureConditions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  water_level FLOAT,
  dissolved_oxygen FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE WaterSources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(255),
  source_type VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE FishSpecies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  average_weight FLOAT,
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE DataLog (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  record_id INT,
  data_type VARCHAR(255),
  data_value VARCHAR(255)
)
